general: Today, the Moon enters Taurus, elevating your standards and facilitating the release of unnecessary burdens. You are heading towards personal improvement that highlights certain commitments. Be mindful of whom and what you dedicate your time and energy to. As the afternoon approaches, Mars activates your energy; it is essential to monitor your mood and endurance, noting if certain people or situations drain you. Possessive or jealous tendencies may emerge with Pluto's agitation, helping you identify toxic dynamics. This evening, the lunar quarter creates an enchanting atmosphere, urging you to retreat and immerse yourself in your thoughts.
love: Be open to communication with your partner to avoid misunderstandings.
work: Exercise discernment in your professional choices; prioritize your commitments.
health: Pay attention to your energy; avoid draining environments.
advice: Choose wisely where to invest your energy.
teaser: Elevate your standards today, dear Libra.
